item.title: GCP random notes
item.description: Decision Tree Summarize decision trees to decide which gcp services you should use in a certain circumstance. Compute option GCP offers a multiple compute services. Here is a list of those services and how customizable/managed they are. Decision Tree References Choosing the right compute option in GCP: a decision tree
